text: Alastair Gray (born 22 June 1998) is a British tennis player. Gray has a career high ATP singles ranking of 986 achieved on 30 October 2017. He also has a career high ATP doubles ranking of 1373 achieved on 21 November 2016. Gray made his ATP main draw debut at the 2019 Hall of Fame Open after receiving a wildcard for the singles main draw. Gray plays college tennis at Texas Christian University. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:British male tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Twickenham Category:TCU Horned Frogs men's tennis players
title: Alastair Gray
